member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory
member.summary: Represents a particular category of sounds. Reference page contains links to related code samples.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.Equals(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified AudioCategory is equal to this AudioCategory.
member.param: AudioCategory to compare with this instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified Object is equal to this AudioCategory.
member.param: Object to compare with this instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.GetHashCode
member.summary: Gets the hash code for this instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.Name
member.summary: Specifies the friendly name of this category.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.op_Equality(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified AudioCategory instances are equal.
member.param: Object to the left of the equality operator.
Object to the right of the equality operator.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.op_Inequality(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified AudioCategory instances are not equal.
member.param: Object to the left of the inequality operator.
Object to the right of the inequality operator.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.Pause
member.summary: Pauses all sounds associated with this category.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.Resume
member.summary: Resumes all paused sounds associated with this category.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.SetVolume(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the volume of all sounds associated with this category. Reference page contains links to related code samples.
member.param: Volume amplitude multiplier. volume is normally between 0.0 (silence) and 1.0 (full volume), but can range from 0.0f to float.MaxValue. Volume levels map to decibels (dB) as shown in the following table. VolumeDescription 0.0f-96 dB (silence) 1.0f +0 dB (full volume as authored) 2.0f +6 dB (6 dB greater than authored)

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.Stop(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioStopOptions)
member.summary: Stops all sounds associated with this category.
member.param: Enumerated value specifying how the sounds should be stopped.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioCategory.ToString
member.summary: Returns a String representation of this AudioCategory.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine
member.summary: Represents the audio engine. Applications use the methods of the audio engine to instantiate and manipulate core audio objects. Reference page contains links to related code samples.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class, using a path to an XACT global settings file.
member.param: Path to a global settings file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine.#ctor(System.String,System.TimeSpan,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class, using a settings file, a specific audio renderer, and a specific speaker configuration.
member.param: Path to a global settings file.
Interactive audio and branch event look-ahead time, in milliseconds.
A string that specifies the audio renderer to use.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine.ContentVersion
member.summary: Specifies the current content version.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine.Dispose
member.summary: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by this object.

member.summary: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by this object.
member.param: [MarshalAsAttribute(U1)] true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine.Disposing
member.summary: Occurs when Dispose is called or when this object is finalized and collected by the garbage collector of the Microsoft .NET common language runtime (CLR).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine.Finalize
member.summary: Allows this object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before garbage collection reclaims the object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine.GetCategory(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an audio category. Reference page contains links to related code samples.
member.param: Friendly name of the category to get.

member.summary: Gets the value of a global variable. Reference page contains links to related conceptual articles.
member.param: Friendly name of the variable.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is disposed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine.RendererDetails
member.summary: Gets a collection of audio renderers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine.SetGlobalVariable(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the value of a global variable.
member.param: Value of the global variable.
Friendly name of the global variable.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine.Update
member.summary: Performs periodic work required by the audio engine. Reference page contains links to related code samples.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioStopOptions
member.summary: Controls how Cue objects should stop when Stop is called.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioStopOptions.AsAuthored
member.summary: Indicates the cue should stop normally, playing any release phase or transition specified in the content.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioStopOptions.Immediate
member.summary: Indicates the cue should stop immediately, ignoring any release phase or transition specified in the content.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue
member.summary: Defines methods for managing the playback of sounds. Reference page contains links to related code samples.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.Apply3D(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioListener,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEmitter)
member.summary: Calculates the 3D audio values between an AudioEmitter and an AudioListener object, and applies the resulting values to this Cue. Reference page contains code sample.
member.param: The listener to calculate.
The emitter to calculate.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.Dispose
member.summary: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by this object.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.Disposing
member.summary: Occurs when Dispose is called or when this object is finalized and collected by the garbage collector of the Microsoft .NET common language runtime (CLR).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.GetVariable(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a cue-instance variable value based on its friendly name.
member.param: Friendly name of the variable.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.IsCreated
member.summary: Returns whether the cue has been created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the object has been disposed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.IsPaused
member.summary: Returns whether the cue is currently paused.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.IsPlaying
member.summary: Returns whether the cue is playing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.IsPrepared
member.summary: Returns whether the cue is prepared to play.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.IsPreparing
member.summary: Returns whether the cue is preparing to play.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.IsStopped
member.summary: Returns whether the cue is currently stopped.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.IsStopping
member.summary: Returns whether the cue is stopping playback.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.Name
member.summary: Returns the friendly name of the cue.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.Pause
member.summary: Pauses playback. Reference page contains links to related code samples.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.Play
member.summary: Requests playback of a prepared or preparing Cue. Reference page contains links to related code samples.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.Resume
member.summary: Resumes playback of a paused Cue. Reference page contains links to related code samples.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.SetVariable(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the value of a cue-instance variable based on its friendly name.
member.param: Friendly name of the variable to set.
Value to assign to the variable.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.Cue.Stop(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioStopOptions)
member.summary: Stops playback of a Cue. Reference page contains links to related code samples.
member.param: Enumerated value specifying how the sound should stop. If set to None, the sound will play any release phase or transition specified in the audio designer. If set to Immediate, the sound will stop immediately, ignoring any release phases or transitions.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundBank
member.summary: Represents a sound bank, which is a collection of cues. Reference page contains links to related code samples.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundBank.#ctor(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class using a sound bank from file.
member.param: Audio engine that will be associated with this sound bank.
Path to the sound bank file.

member.summary: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by this object.

member.summary: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by this object.
member.param: [MarshalAsAttribute(U1)] true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundBank.Disposing
member.summary: Occurs when Dispose is called or when this object is finalized and collected by the garbage collector of the Microsoft .NET common language runtime (CLR).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundBank.Finalize
member.summary: Allows this object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before garbage collection reclaims the object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundBank.GetCue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a cue from the sound bank. Reference page contains links to related code samples.
member.param: Friendly name of the cue to get.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundBank.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is disposed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundBank.IsInUse
member.summary: Returns whether the sound bank is currently in use.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundBank.PlayCue(System.String)
member.summary: Plays a cue. Reference page contains links to related code samples.
member.param: Name of the cue to play.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundBank.PlayCue(System.String,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioListener,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEmitter)
member.summary: Plays a cue using 3D positional information specified in an AudioListener and AudioEmitter. Reference page contains links to related code samples.
member.param: Name of the cue to play.
AudioListener that specifies listener 3D audio information.
AudioEmitter that specifies emitter 3D audio information.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.WaveBank
member.summary: Represents a wave bank, which is a collection of wave files. Reference page contains links to related code samples.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.WaveBank.#ctor(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new, in-memory instance of this class using a specified AudioEngine and path to a wave bank file.
member.param: Instance of an AudioEngine to associate this wave bank with.
Path to the wave bank file to load.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.WaveBank.#ctor(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioEngine,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int16)
member.summary: Initializes a new, streaming instance of this class, using a provided AudioEngine and streaming wave bank parameters.
member.param: Instance of an AudioEngine to associate this wave bank with.
Path to the wave bank file to stream from.
Offset within the wave bank data file. This offset must be DVD sector aligned.
Stream packet size, in sectors, to use for each stream. The minimum value is 2.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.WaveBank.Dispose
member.summary: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by this object.

member.summary: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by this object.
member.param: [MarshalAsAttribute(U1)] true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.WaveBank.Disposing
member.summary: Occurs when Dispose is called or when this object is finalized and collected by the garbage collector of the Microsoft .NET common language runtime (CLR).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.WaveBank.Finalize
member.summary: Allows this object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before garbage collection reclaims the object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.WaveBank.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is disposed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.WaveBank.IsInUse
member.summary: Returns whether the wave bank is currently in use.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.WaveBank.IsPrepared
member.summary: Returns whether the wave bank is prepared to play.
